name: Decrease / Contraction
themes: fuel that starts the human experiential way

interpretation.behavioral_axis: Knows who should hold what feeling/resource so nothing is wasted.
interpretation.shadow_axis: Dumps feelings too fast or onto the wrong person when pressured.

sources.primary: Ra Uru Hu, The Complete Rave I’Ching (Jovian Archive), p. 85
sources.exaltation_quote: The imagination to make the very best out of very little. Coolness, where the energy to release feelings is selective.
sources.detriment_quote: A tendency in understanding, to assume capability, leading to strain. The hothead, the urge to release feelings.

interpretation.behavioral_axis: Shares feelings/resources only when personal base is secure.
interpretation.shadow_axis: People-pleasing that burns through limited fuel.

sources.primary: Ra Uru Hu, The Complete Rave I’Ching (Jovian Archive), p. 85
sources.exaltation_quote: A conservative nature that does not risk its own security in aiding others. Energy for one's own feelings but not for others.
sources.detriment_quote: A desire for recognition that throws caution to the wind, depleting valuable resources for only temporary gain.

classical.hd_quote: In times of decrease selfishness is justified.

interpretation.behavioral_axis: Pulls energy back to ensure the cycle can actually start.
interpretation.shadow_axis: Looks selfish or ungenerous when resources are low.

sources.primary: Ra Uru Hu, The Complete Rave I’Ching (Jovian Archive), p. 85
sources.exaltation_quote: Material ambition and the discipline to go at it alone. The energy that fuels the feeling for personal ambition.
sources.detriment_quote: Instinctive assistance, admirable but in this position misguided, where two will use up resources twice as fast as one.

interpretation.behavioral_axis: Reorganizes relationships and feelings around what the field actually has.
interpretation.shadow_axis: Holds on to weak ties and bleeds energy.

sources.primary: Ra Uru Hu, The Complete Rave I’Ching (Jovian Archive), p. 85
sources.exaltation_quote: Survival of the fittest and its eventual flourishing. The energy for adaption and a deep feeling for survival.
sources.detriment_quote: The expenditure of energy on maintaining relationships rather than on correction.

classical.hd_quote: The external recognition of one's potential despite limitations.

interpretation.behavioral_axis: When seen, can direct the cycle and feelings for the group.
interpretation.shadow_axis: If not seen, turns dissatisfaction into emotional negativity.

sources.primary: Ra Uru Hu, The Complete Rave I’Ching (Jovian Archive), p. 85
sources.exaltation_quote: The value of energy when properly channelled. The fuel for properly channelled feelings despite limitations.
sources.detriment_quote: A persistent dissatisfaction with limitation which hampers development even when supported.

classical.hd_quote: The law that the maximization of potential not only ends decrease but inevitably such transcendence benefits others.

interpretation.behavioral_axis: When the feeling is right and maximized, everyone nearby benefits.
interpretation.shadow_axis: Withholds success out of fear it will be taken.

sources.primary: Ra Uru Hu, The Complete Rave I’Ching (Jovian Archive), p. 85
sources.exaltation_quote: The maximization of the potential of form. The father whose success will benefit his children. The fuel for recognition through feelings.
sources.detriment_quote: The tendency in transcendence to keep it a secret in fear of being deprived of its special advantages. The fuel for secret or repressed feelings.

meta.provenance: All line titles and sentences lifted from Ra Uru Hu, The Complete Rave I’Ching (Jovian Archive), p. 85 (same material lineage as the Line Companion on Archive.org). All “hd_quote” strings are single sentences from that page and under 25 words.
